title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 468.1 - Purpose and scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 468.1 - Purpose and scope

State Regulations

Pursuant to section
114
of the Indian Law, the Superintendent of

State Police has the responsibility to determine the minimum police training
standards for the appointment of police officers to the St. Regis Mohawk Tribe

Police Department, and the discretion to appoint police officers to the Tribe

Police Department and to suspend or revoke such appointments. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
468.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
